description:
archive/zip: verify CRC32s in non-streamed files

We should check the CRC32s of files on EOF, even if there's no
data descriptor (in streamed files), as long as there's a non-zero
CRC32 in the file header / TOC.

messages.text:

archive/zip: verify CRC32s in non-streamed files

We should check the CRC32s of files on EOF, even if there's no
data descriptor (in streamed files), as long as there's a non-zero
CRC32 in the file header / TOC.
